data.title: Let's Talk - JAWS
data.meta_description: An addictively fun podcast immersed in anything and everything related to JAWS. Hosts: Jason Connell, award-winning documentary producer & JAWS mega ...
data.text:
Into The Mystic

Episode 10: Interview - Carl Gottlieb (Screenwriter - Jaws, Jaws 2, Jaws 3-D)

Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez have well-known screenwriter, director, and actor Carl Gottlieb (Jaws, Jaws 2, Jaws 3-D) on the show. They discuss his legendary screenplays, his directorial debut, and his famous book The Jaws Log.

Official Sponsor:

Narragansett Beer

Recorded: 05-06-24 & 07-19-23

Studio: Just Curious Media

Listen:

Buzzsprout

Apple Podcasts

Spotify

Amazon Music

iHeartRadio

Hosts:

Jason Connell

Sal Rodriguez

Let's Talk - JAWS

Episode 08: Tribute - Susan Backlinie (Chrissie Watkins) - Jaws "First Victim"

Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez pay tribute to the late well-known stuntwoman and actor Susan Backlinie who played Chrissie Watkins, the first victim, in the iconic opening scene of Jaws.

Susan Backlinie

Born: September 1, 1946

Died: May 11, 2024 (77)

Official Sponsor:

Narragansett Beer

Recorded: 05-29-24

Studio: Just Curious Media

Let's Talk - JAWS

Episode 06: Narragansett Beer - "Crush It Like Quint"

Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez discuss Narragansett Beer becoming an official sponsor of the show and their memorable role in Jaws as Quint's beverage of choice.

Official Sponsor:

Narragansett Beer

Let's Talk - JAWS

Episode 05: Jaws "Franchise" - Vol. 02

Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez revisit the classic movie franchise again and talk about all things in the Jaws universe. The discussion was on Let's Talk - Movies and was the launching point for Let's Talk - JAWS.

“The terrifying motion picture from the terrifying No. 1 best seller.”

Jaws (1975)

Synopsis: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Producer: David Brown, Richard Zanuck

Director: Steven Spielberg

Writer: Peter Benchley (book), Carl Gottlieb (screenplay)

Cinematographer: Bill Butler

Camera Operator: Michael Chapman

Composer: John Williams

Production Designer: Joe Alves

Editor: Verna Fields

Cast: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary, Murray Hamilton, Carl Gottlieb, Jeffrey Kramer

Recorded: 02-28-24 & 08-29-23

Studio: Just Curious Media

Listen:

Episode 03: The Shark Is Still Working - The Impact & Legacy of Jaws (2007)

Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez discuss the famous documentary, The Shark Is Still Working - The Impact & Legacy of Jaws, and share their connection to the project.
